changes.en: filter the history that is not a valid url or is a chrome-extension url
changes.zh: filter the history that is not a valid url or is a chrome-extension url

changes.en: new panel for showing contact and new icon for creating issue
changes.zh: new panel for showing contact and new icon for creating issue

changes.en: improve display mode in iframe window
changes.zh: improve display mode in iframe window

changes.en: new icon for setting entrance and separate css for options page
changes.zh: new icon for setting entrance and separate css for options page

changes.en: release setting page and upgrade text-search-engine to 1.4.4
changes.zh: release setting page and upgrade text-search-engine to 1.4.4

changes.en: setting page
changes.zh: add search panel & window config

changes.en: get windowConfig from extension storage and apply it when restart it
changes.zh: add language setting plugin

changes.en: add monorepo
changes.zh: move history param from web storage to extension storage

changes.en: fix js error
changes.zh: fix js error

changes.en: readjust the window size opened
changes.zh: readjust the window size opened

changes.en: update languageAtom from navigator.language when launch and optimize contants for i18n atom
changes.zh: refine ts type and optimize css for divide item

changes.en: new feature for top suggestions and display empty status when no data found
changes.zh: new feature for top suggestions and display empty status when no data found

changes.en: optimize type hints for i18n
changes.zh: init setting page and use chrome i18n

changes.en: fix active tab in sidePanel
changes.zh: add i18n with jotai

changes.en: support open a modal when current tab is in fullscreen state
changes.zh: 支持在全屏状态下打开一个模态框

changes.en: add plugin system to integrate commands
changes.zh: 添加插件系统以集成命令

changes.en: upgrade text-search-engine to 1.4.2
changes.zh: 升级 text-search-engine 到 1.4.2 版本

changes.en: feat: add debounce when change active tab
changes.zh: 功能：切换活动标签页时添加防抖

changes.en: Determine if chrome.tabGroups exists to adapt for 360 Browser
changes.zh: 检测 chrome.tabGroups 是否存在以适配 360 浏览器

changes.en: feat: add tabGroup title and color
changes.zh: 功能：添加标签组标题和颜色

changes.en: support hybrid searching which include host and title
changes.zh: 支持包含域名和标题的混合搜索

changes.en: optimize operation button styles
changes.zh: 优化操作按钮样式

changes.en: only listen to keydown event when not in composition(typing chinese in pinyin)
changes.zh: 仅在非输入法组合状态下监听键盘按下事件（使用拼音输入中文时）

changes.en: add strictness coefficient to filter out results that are not highly relevant to the search value
changes.zh: 添加严格系数以过滤掉与搜索值相关度不高的结果

changes.en: Optimize pinyin search under Chinese input method state
changes.zh: 优化中文输入法状态下通过拼音搜索

changes.en: add operations for each item which includes query, delete, close and so on
changes.zh: 为每个项目添加操作，包括查询、删除、关闭等
